data.text: The remembrance of Josias is like the composition of the perfume
He behaved himself uprightly in the conversion of the people,
He directed his heart unto the Lord,
All, except David and Ezekias and Josias, were defective:
Therefore he gave their power unto others,
They burnt the chosen city of the sanctuary,
It was Ezekiel who saw the glorious vision,
For he made mention of the enemies under the figure of the rain,
And of the twelve prophets let the memorial be blessed,
So was Jesus the son of Josedec:
And among the elect was Neemias,
But upon the earth was no man created like Enoch;
Neither was there a man born like unto Joseph,
Sem and Seth were in great honour among men,
